name: 19 Bloesem Street
description:
This is yet a prototype for demonstrating the idea..

  • Currently, the game might not be very performant: 
  • The requirement of your device might be relatively high, if the game performance is poor on your device, you might run into unacceptable lags, please fully exit the game and restart it if needed, your progress should be saved.
  • You may experience a long waiting period before the WebGL version loads (before the Unity logo shows).
  • The game involves a lot of waiting and will require days to complete
  • If you must... you may adjust your system time. 
  • If you wish to adjust your system time for a quicker play, it is recommended to fully exit the game before adjusting, although it should be all fine if not.
